content.body: would CSP even allow a string to be passed into sr.evaluate?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: would CSP even allow a string to be passed into sr.evaluate?

content.body:
> <@ljharb:matrix.org> would CSP even allow a string to be passed into sr.evaluate?

If the script hash is matching
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @ljharb:matrix.org
would CSP even allow a string to be passed into sr.evaluate?
If the script hash is matching

content.body: since only the top-level app can do anything with hashes and CSP settings, that means that packages can't use ShadowRealm.evaluate at all :-/
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: since only the top-level app can do anything with hashes and CSP settings, that means that packages can't use ShadowRealm.evaluate at all :-/

content.body: We will have module blocks in the future
